name: Blagger (Enhanced version)
overview: Blagger enhanced version with the following improvements: - Screen 2 colored graphics. - Some little graphic designs enhancements. - Multicolor sprites. - Every 5 levels a checkpoint is saved in memory. You don't need to restart every time from level 00!. - Suicide key. - Works in 8KB RAM MSX machines. - ...and all packed in a 16KB ROM.
